typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Query as string,
		TitleUrl2 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source2
Select1 aggregate(groupBy(Query,
		Title),
	Url = first(Url)) ~> Aggregate1
source2 derive(Title = split(TitleUrl2,' ')[1],
		Url = split(TitleUrl2,' ')[2]) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		Query,
		Title,
		Url
	)) ~> Select1
Aggregate1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['output'],
	truncate: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
